events.message: We have received your application for the Senior Software Engineer role and will review it promptly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department focusing on backend development.
A dedicated recruiter has been assigned to your profile to guide you through the recruitment steps.
Your initial screening was successful; we appreciate the thoroughness of your software engineering experience.
Thank you for your prompt response to the screening feedback and for confirming your availability for interviews.
We have scheduled your technical interview with our lead developer on May 7th at 10 AM UTC.
You completed the technical interview demonstrating strong problem-solving and software development skills.
Your HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss company culture and benefits.
You finished the HR interview with a great fit for our organizational values and team environment.
We have formally proposed an offer for the Senior Software Engineer position reflecting your experience and skills.
You provided positive feedback regarding the offer and expressed enthusiasm about joining our engineering team.
You officially accepted the job offer, and we are excited to welcome you aboard as part of our engineering group.
Your onboarding process has started, including orientation and setup to integrate you into our software development team.
The hiring process is now closed successfully with your full integration into our engineering department.
